experience: You and Jarett both know Gordon McConnell, Katrina Fox, and 5 others

American Express OPENJuly 2013 – Present Greater New York City AreaAs a Regional Manager, Business Development at American Express OPEN, I serve as a trusted business consultant to 500 small and medium-sized ($3-500 million revenues) companies in the Greater New York City Area. My focus is set on helping our business clients maximize OPEN's suite of products while driving business growth and uncovering value opportunities. Included in this focus: Increasing both top and bottom-line revenue, identifying cost-saving opportunities, improving cash flow, increasing control and implementing strategy. This is accomplished through scheduled client meetings and successful consultative selling. Exceeded annual growth goals in both 2013 & 20142013 - A top contributor on a successful Field Sales expansion that included a small team of top Client Managers and which led to the rapid growth of a large national sales organization.  Awards: 2014 President’s Customer Service Award Winner2014 Regional Client Manager Leadership Award2015 President's Achievement Award – Pinnacle Award Winner        -Exceptional results across business priorities above and beyond job scope

American Express OPENSeptember 2012 – July 2013Phoenix, ArizonaAs a Client Advisor in OPEN’s Top Client Development, I lead the Early Tenure Client Expansion team in both production and contribution. Responsible for developing the Early Tenure Client model by fully engaging OPEN Clients and clearly articulating OPEN`s value proposition. Working with 250 Early Tenure clients, I implemented consultative selling techniques while educating, enabling, and inspiring spend growth with these new clients. Coupled with the Early Tenure initiative, I played an integral role working with the Top Client Acquisition team on the strategy and creation of the on-boarding process for first time OPEN card members.  I was the top producer and key contributor to the early success of this expansion team and its rapid growth.  Exceeded goal in 2012 and 2013Awards: 2013 Gold Award winner – Top Producer

As Director of Operations with Cartridge World Franchise system I was responsible for the acquisition and management of new unit franchisees. •Provided sales and operational support to the franchise system through strategic planning, financial analysis, marketing/sales strategy, and general business operations.•Responsible for growing unit franchise revenue through B2B and B2C sales initiatives.•Developed and presented business models, strategies and forecasts to prospective partners.•Responsible for establishing and maintaining key relationships with prospective franchisees, customers and potential business expansion partners. •Collaborated with the franchise owners, managers and vendors to improve business efficiencies.

As a Financial Advisor with AXA Advisors I was responsible for builiding and maintaining a client base while acquiring new clients on a continual basis. Provided knowledgeable, objective financial guidance, customized strategies, and solutions to consumer segments that demanded high quality service.Awards:2009 - Recognized as Top A-Class producer for achieving highest sales production in the division.
